doc.title: Secrets and Lies
doc.plot: Relationships end and start this week for popular couple Aimee and Travis. He wants things to go further, but Aimee hasn't picked up on it yet - she's too busy having a good time with her girlfriends.So when the gang are introduced to a new student, Sylvia - an ex model - Travis (along with all the other guys) tries to impress her... Bobby catches Jonathan writing a love letter, and Bobby assumes its to the new girl, Sylvia. But when Aimee reads out a love letter she's received, Bobby knows who the culprit is. Only problem is, she thinks it's from Travis! When Sylvia decides to toy with Travis, and go over to his house to work on their school project - he assumes she wants to spend the night with him, with disasterous consequences! Meanwhile, Nisha and Kirk notice that Sway isn't her usual self lately- she's messy, grumpy and constantly tired - Kirk decides to get to the bottom of it.
